title: kaNNArak-kANbadeppO
sahitya:
kaNNArak-kANbadeppO kanaka sabhaiyil ADum enadu durairAjanaik-


anupallavi

  eNNi eNNi ingE Engi Engit-tavittE EkAnkiyAgi shiva mOham koNDavennuLLam


caraNam 1    bOdha sadguruvAgap-porundip-perum turaiyil vAtavUraDigaLaivAzhvitta jyOtiyaik-
    caraNam 2    tiruvAcakam tarum poruLidenra aruL oLi maruvi marainda maNi vAcakar pOlavE nAn
